channel.title: Help, stopping attacks on team players?!?!

item.title: Help, stopping attacks on team players?!?!
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

I am currently turning the fight caves into team caves, where when u click enter u choose to be on saradomin or zamorak. How do i make it so u can’t attack ur team players, but u can attack the other team players.
This is the code that tells your team

String team = "";

but when ur on zamorak it has

team = "Zamorak";

and same with Saradomin, so if anyone could plz tell me how to make it so u can’t attack players on your own team.
By the way this is the code that it knows ur in the teamcaves

public boolean inWar() { if( (absX >= 2370 && absX <= 2425 && absY >= 5060 && absY <=5120 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Read full topic
item.source: Help, stopping attacks on team players?!?!
